commentary: Saeed Ajmal to Dilshan, 1 run Has Tanvir missed a run-out here? MJ is late to start as Dilshan dabs this to short third. Tanvir is slow, too, and fires in a half-volley throw. As Sarfraz hits the stumps with his gloves, MJ is out. The bails come off in the next frame - and there is a huge lag, we are working with a slow frame rate here - and by then MJ is in, only slightly in. The correct decision given the technology available. Had Tanvir been slightly quicker, though, Pakistan would have had their man

commentary: Malinga to Shahid Afridi, OUT that's a lovely catch from Sanga. That should do it for the game, and should make up for that drop too. It's a slower ball, mind you. Short of a length, Afridi looks to run it down, gets an edge, and it goes not only wide, it is also dying on Sanga. He dives full length, and plucks this one-handed. That's his 300th catch too. Not a bad way to bring it up
